# Berraquera Santandereana - LLM Access Information

## Site Information
name: Berraquera Santandereana
url: https://www.berraquera.co
description: Medio digital de noticias de Santander, Bucaramanga y el Área Metropolitana de Colombia
language: es-CO
category: news, regional journalism

## Content Access
- Full content is available for AI/LLM indexing
- News articles are updated daily
- All content is in Spanish (Colombia)

## Primary Topics
- Regional politics (Santander, Colombia)
- Economy (Ecopetrol, local business)
- Environment (Santurbán páramo, conservation)
- Public safety
- Education
- Technology

## Contact
editorial: contacto@berraquera.co
website: https://www.berraquera.co

## API/Data Access
- RSS Feed: https://www.berraquera.co/rss.xml
- Sitemap: https://www.berraquera.co/sitemap.xml
- Full LLM info: https://www.berraquera.co/llms.txt

## Permissions
- AI training: allowed
- Content summarization: allowed
- Citation required: yes

## Last Updated
2026-01-19
